data.title: ‘‘Growth gives you the means to lend a helping hand”, says Joy Alukkas
data.meta_description: Joyalukkas Exchange, a renowned money exchange company, played its part by offering free money transfers to those supporting Turkey.
data.text:
Muscat, November 25, 2023 – Post the devastating earthquake in Turkey last year, the global outpouring of humanitarian aid included a significant contribution from Oman. Joyalukkas Exchange, a renowned money exchange company, played its part by offering free money transfers to those supporting Turkey. This compassionate gesture resonates with Mr. Joy Alukkas’ core belief that social responsibility is an integral aspect of ethical corporate practices. He believes “With success & growth our commitment to the society we thrive in should increase”. The company has a commendable history of humanitarian aid, extending commission-free money transfer facilities to entities like the Prime Minister Relief Fund in Pakistan, and the Chief Minister’s Relief Fund in Kerala, India. This philanthropic approach is a cornerstone of Joyalukkas Exchange’s growth, making it a preferred money transfer organization globally.

Antony Jose, Executive Director, Joyalukkas Exchange expresses the company’s intention to establish its brand in other countries, mirroring the success of its sister concern, Joyalukkas Jewellery. The Joyalukkas Foundation underscores the commitment to humanitarian causes beyond business interests.

Joyalukkas Exchange, launched in 2013, stands as a beacon for expatriates, embodying its tagline ‘We are with you.’ Under the visionary leadership of Chairman & MD, Mr. Joy Alukkas, the company took over the ailing Majan Exchange LLC and successfully transformed it into Joyalukkas Exchange LLC. Today, with 40 branches and 314 staff, it provides efficient money transfer services to expats globally. In 2023 alone, Joyalukkas Exchange expanded with seven new branches, with plans to open ten more in the coming years.
